mandatory.name: Rabies
mandatory.description: A viral disease fatal to dogs and humans. First dose includes microchipping.

recommended.name: Hexavalent Vaccine
recommended.description: Protects against 6 diseases: Parvovirus, Distemper, Hepatitis, Influenza, and Leptospirosis.

recommended.name: Parkworm Prevention
recommended.description: Prevents infestation by a parasitic worm transmitted through beetles.

recommended.name: Kennel Cough
recommended.description: Protects against Kennel Cough, a mild respiratory infection.
